name: DiceMan
description:
Ever wondered how that fancy quantum physics works?

Truth is, there is a guy, living somewhere between dimensions, roaming multiverse fighting particles and vile cuboids!

He is The One, Alpha and Omega. His Dice decides basically every random fluctuation in laws of nature.

Is he a God? Dunno... Only thing that is certain, he needs to throw his dice a lot fighting enthropy cuboids or The Universe will end!

Or will it?

Luck is your weapon

Throw the dice at enemies. Your attack depends on the facet rolled.

Change is your chance

Every 5 seconds your game changes. Tune in to it.

Keep going while you're alive

Destroy as many enemies as you can
